effect.scarlet_violet: For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage. Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect. This effect is removed by gravity. If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.
effect.the_teal_mask: For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage. Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect. This effect is removed by gravity. If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.
effect.the_indigo_disk: For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage. Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect. This effect is removed by gravity. If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.
